item.title: 全球海运石油量下降，俄罗斯主要出口大幅减少
item.description: 7 月份，俄罗斯从西方主要港口的原油出口量跌至 19 个月来的最低点，这也是全球海运石油流量整体下降的原因之一。【原文：Russia’s crude exports from key western ports slumped to a 19-month low in July, underpinning an overall decline in seaborne oil flows worldwide.】

item.title: 纳斯达克 100 指数陷入调整区间，人工智能宠儿纷纷下挫
item.description: 大科技股的剧烈轮动使纳斯达克 100 指数跌入调整区间，在短短三周多的时间里抹去了超过 2 万亿美元的价值，因为交易员们平仓了一年多以来一直在赚钱的赌注。【原文：The violent rotation from Big Tech plunged the Nasdaq 100 Index into correction territory, wiping out more than $2 trillion in value in just over three weeks, as traders unwound bets that had been minting money for over a year.】

item.title: 嘉士伯将斥资 7.44 亿美元收购印度和尼泊尔的其他部门
item.description: 嘉士伯公司将以 7.44 亿美元的价格完全控制其在印度和尼泊尔的业务，以加强在该地区的发展。【原文：Carlsberg AS will take full control of its businesses in India and Nepal for $744 million as it steps up growth in the region.】

item.title: 中国人民银行加大对经济的支持力度，重点转向消费
item.description: 中国央行表示，中国的银行必须为促进实体经济做出更多努力，这是央行为重振中国疲软的消费所做的最新努力。【原文：China’s central bank said the country’s banks have to do more to foster the real economy in its latest effort to reignite the country’s flagging consumption.】

item.title: 美国拒绝越南解除 "非市场经济国家 "标签的请求
item.description: 拜登政府拒绝了越南要求被正式归类为 "市场经济国家 "的请求，这使越南促进对其最重要市场出口的努力遭遇挫折。【原文：The Biden administration rejected Vietnam’s request to be classified officially as a “market economy,” a setback for the country’s efforts to boost exports to its most important market.】

item.title: 伊比德罗拉公司将以 21 亿英镑收购英国电力网络股份
item.description: Iberdrola SA 已同意从关西电力公司、Equitix Ltd 和 CNIC Funds LLC 牵头的财团手中收购英国曼彻斯特电网运营商 Electricity North-West 88% 的股份。【原文：Iberdrola SA has agreed to acquire 88% of Electricity North-West, the electricity grid operator for Manchester, England, from a consortium led by Kansai Electric Power Co. Inc, Equitix Ltd and CNIC Funds LLC.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利获得分析师梅奥减持的唯一看跌信号
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co. ）的 Mike Mayo 将摩根士丹利的股票评级从 "等权重 "下调至 "减持"，并称鉴于一些业务面临的压力，摩根士丹利的估值看起来很高。【原文：Morgan Stanley got its first bearish call from an analyst this year, as Wells Fargo & Co.’s Mike Mayo lowered the stock to underweight from equalweight and said its valuation looks rich given pressure on some businesses.】

item.title: 麦克德莫特探索出售储罐业务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，麦克德莫特国际公司（McDermott International, Inc.【原文：McDermott International, Inc. is mulling options, including a sale, for its storage and tank business, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 外国人今年首次重返巴西股市
item.description: 外国投资者正在试水巴西遭受重创的股市。【原文：Foreign investors are testing the waters in Brazil’s battered stock market.】

item.title: 美国 7 月就业数据疲软，黄金逼近历史纪录
item.description: 在弱于预期的美国就业数据再次证实美联储将很快开始降息的预期后，黄金跳涨，再次逼近其最新纪录。【原文：Gold jumped to close in again on its latest record, after weaker-than-expected US jobs data reaffirmed expectations that the Federal Reserve will start to cut interest rates soon.】

item.title: 以色列资产引领该地区在战争风险打击下转为熊市
item.description: 以色列及其邻国的资产损失不断增加，表明全球投资者正在重新评估他们先前对中东战争将得到控制的乐观看法。【原文：Mounting asset losses in Israel and neighboring countries signal that global investors are reassessing their earlier optimism the Middle Eastern war would be contained.】

item.title: Hartree 收购 ED&F Man，拓展软商品贸易
item.description: 美国能源贸易公司 Hartree Partners LP 同意收购 ED&F Man 的大宗商品业务，ED&F Man 是英国一家历史悠久的原材料贸易商，其历史可追溯到 240 多年前。【原文：US energy trading firm Hartree Partners LP agreed to buy the commodities business of ED&F Man, a storied UK trader of raw materials that traces its history back more than 240 years.】

item.title: 欧佩克保持石油产量稳定，同时对市场保持谨慎态度
item.description: 欧佩克（OPEC）上个月的石油产量基本保持稳定，同时谨慎监测其最新减产措施对全球市场的影响。【原文：OPEC kept oil production broadly steady last month while it cautiously monitors the impact of its latest cutbacks on global markets.】

item.title: 英国央行首席经济学家敦促不要过快降息
item.description: 英国央行首席经济学家休-皮尔（Huw Pill）警告说，不要预期很快会进一步降息，他说遏制通胀的努力尚未结束，有证据表明企业仍在推动价格上涨。【原文：Bank of England Chief Economist Huw Pill warned against anticipating further interest rate reductions soon, saying efforts to contain inflation aren’t yet finished and there’s evidence that companies are still driving up prices.】

item.title: 阿根廷双线作战，捍卫比索，消耗储备
item.description: 阿根廷决定将其对比索的保护扩大到平行市场，这正在消耗其外汇储备，并打击其遭受重创的经济中最脆弱的商品：投资者信心。【原文：Argentina’s decision to extend its defense of the peso to the parallel market is draining its foreign currency reserves and denting the most fragile of commodities in its battered economy: investor confidence.】

item.title: 劳斯莱斯不惧市场低迷，股价延续辉煌涨势
item.description: 在全球股市遭遇抛售的一周里，劳斯莱斯控股公司（Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc）延续了涨势；一些分析师认为，这家喷气发动机制造商的股价还有进一步飙升的空间。【原文：In a week that saw global stocks sell off, Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc extended its rally — and some analysts see room for the jet engine-maker’s shares to surge further.】

item.title: 阿波罗和 KKR 以 17.5 亿英镑贷款支持 Hargreaves Lansdown 的竞购
item.description: 知情人士称，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）和 KKR & Co.是提供 17.5 亿英镑（22 亿美元）贷款的私人信贷基金之一，用于为英国基金管理公司 Hargreaves Lansdown 的收购和退市计划提供资金。【原文：Apollo Global Management and KKR & Co. are among a group of private credit funds providing a £1.75 billion ($2.2 billion) loan to finance the buyout and planned delisting of UK money manager Hargreaves Lansdown, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 石油对中东风险无动于衷，反弹前景存疑
item.description:
交易商对该地区的危机已习以为常，这些危机虽然会引起恐慌，但往往不会影响原油的流动。【原文：

Traders have become habituated to crises in the region that, while causing alarm, often leave crude flows unscathed.

】

item.title: 戴蒙推动下届内阁中有私营部门代表
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）表示，随着国内和地缘政治问题日益增多，下一任美国总统必须努力将这个 "严重分裂 "的国家团结在一起，并表示商界应该在内阁中有自己的代表。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon said the next US president must work to bring together a “deeply divided” nation as domestic and geopolitical issues mount, and said the business world should have representation in the Cabinet.】

item.title: 影响者的首选数字零售商发现实体店是关键
item.description: Revolve 集团公司在流行病期间曾是受年轻时尚影响者追捧的时尚中心，但随着销售的萎缩，该公司的股价也在下跌。因此，为了给品牌注入活力，该公司正在尝试一些从未做过的事情：经营一家实体店。【原文：Revolve Group Inc., a popular fashion hub among young influencer-obsessed shoppers during the pandemic, is seeing its shares tumble as sales dry up. So, in an attempt to juice the brand, the company is trying something it’s never done before — run an actual store.】

item.title: 贵族公司、零售王朝寻求对德国房东的交易进行审计
item.description: 一位奥地利古老贵族家族的成员和一位德国零售业巨富的后裔呼吁进行特别审计，以确定德国房地产投资者 VIB Vermoegen AG 与其母公司的交易是否存在不当行为。【原文：A member of an old Austrian noble family and the scion of a German retail fortune are calling for a special audit to determine whether there was wrongdoing in German property investor VIB Vermoegen AG’s dealings with its parent company.】

item.title: 法院允许债务案件和解，Byju's 避免破产
item.description: Byju's 争取到了更多时间来偿还欠印度板球管理委员会的 1900 万美元，使这家在线辅导初创公司暂时避免了破产。【原文：Byju’s secured more time to repay $19 million owed to India’s cricket’s governing board, allowing the online tutoring startup to avoid insolvency for now.】

item.title: 卖空者安德鲁-莱福特被删除的推文再次出现在欺诈案中
item.description: 去年，陷入困境的做空者安德鲁-莱福特（Andrew Left）删除了其研究公司的全部推特历史记录，以抵御他当时所说的 "集体诉讼律师和巨魔 "对他过去股票评论的污蔑。【原文：Embattled short seller Andrew Left deleted his research firm’s entire tweet history last year to fend off what he described at the time as “class-action attorneys and trolls” looking for dirt in his past stock commentary.】

item.title: 埃克森公司因承包商纠纷将金色通道液化天然气项目推迟至 2025 年底
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp. ）和卡塔尔能源公司（QatarEnergy）在主要承包商扎克里控股公司（Zachry Holdings Inc.【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. and QatarEnergy delayed the start of a $10 billion natural gas export project in Texas to the end of next year after lead contractor Zachry Holdings Inc. declared bankruptcy.】

item.title: 埃克森公司超预期，先锋公司交易推动产量创历史新高
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司以 630 亿美元收购先锋自然资源公司（Pioneer Natural Resources Co.【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. exceeded profit expectations after the $63 billion acquisition of Pioneer Natural Resources Co. pushed oil and natural gas output to a record.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。随着对美国经济和大型科技公司的担忧加剧，全球股市的溃败也愈演愈烈。这使得周五的薪资数据受到比往常更多的关注。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. The global rout in stocks is intensifying as worries about the US economy and big tech mount. That’s heaping more scrutiny than usual on Friday’s payrolls data. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 投资银行受到无情重组浪潮的刺激
item.description: 华尔街长期以来一直在谈论交易反弹，但事实证明，对于精品顾问公司来说，破产和重组才是异常持久的 "摇钱树"。【原文：A dealmaking rebound has long been on Wall Street’s lips, but it’s bankruptcy and restructuring that’s proving to be an unusually persistent money-spinner for boutique advisers.】

item.title: 雪佛龙业绩未达预期，赫斯延期压力倍增
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）的利润未达预期，这给首席执行官迈克-沃思（Mike Wirth）带来了更大的压力，迫使他在以 530 亿美元收购赫斯公司（Hess Corp.【原文：Chevron Corp. missed profit estimates, heaping more pressure on Chief Executive Officer Mike Wirth to prevail in his $53 billion effort to acquire Hess Corp.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚总统阿比希望货币贬值至街头市场水平
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚总理阿比-艾哈迈德（Abiy Ahmed）斥责银行将该国货币汇率维持在比平行市场交易商提供的汇率强得多的水平。【原文：Ethiopian Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed berated banks for keeping the exchange rate of the nation’s currency at much stronger levels than what traders in the parallel market were offering.】

item.title: 中国拒绝国际货币基金组织提出的 1 万亿美元住房救助方案
item.description: 中国政府拒绝了国际货币基金组织提出的利用中央政府资金完成未完工住房的建议，而这正是阻碍中国经济扭转颓势的一个关键问题。【原文：Chinese authorities have rejected a proposal made by the International Monetary Fund to use central government funds to complete unfinished housing, a key problem preventing a turnaround of an industry that’s been a major drag on the economy.】
